verses.roman:
premī kṛṣṇadāsa, āra seita brāhmaṇa
gaṅgā-tīra-pathe yāibāra vijña dui-jana

synonyms: premī kṛṣṇadāsa—the devotee Rājaputa Kṛṣṇadāsa; āra—and; seita brāhmaṇa—that Sanoḍiyā brāhmaṇa; gaṅgā-tīra-pathe—on the path by the bank of the Ganges; yāibāra—to go; vijña—experienced; dui-jana—two persons.
translation: Both Rājaputa Kṛṣṇadāsa and the Sanoḍiyā brāhmaṇa knew the path along the Ganges bank very well.
